title: Help Riot
body: If i m Bugsplat before a ranked game it s unfair that i m banned for 5 games in a raw cause it s not my fault.. please Riot solve this Problem thanks

replies.body: The only way to recover your standing with [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is by playing without interruptions.  If you are receiving bugsplat errors then there is a file or driver issue that may be failing to render the game.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
